name: 資訊科技融入教學導論
description: This course is designed to introduce students to the major concepts, models, theories, practices, and research in the field of school ICT integration.
goals: 	學習資訊科技融入教學的主要概念、模型、理論、實際與相關研究
能夠從學生、教師、機會及設備等面向檢視或評估資訊科技融入教學的實施與成效
能依據自己未來的職涯發展或個人興趣探討資訊科技融入教學的相關議題，思考並提出因應策略或未來發展方向建議
能夠認同資訊科技融入教學對當代師、生的重要性與效益，並在適當的時機對相關的人進行遊說或勸說
syllabus:
1.     Foundations of effective ICT integration models

2.     Standards and assessments for students

3.     Levels of teacher computer use  
Stages of technology integration

4.     ICT infrastructure in schools

5.     Innovative uses of ICT in education

6.     Standards and assessments for teachers

7.     Professional development in ICT

8.     Barriers to use of ICT in teaching

9.     ICT in Taiwan education

10.  Integrating distance learning tools

grading.note: Create a complete report and publish on group wiki page
